name: puppeteer
description: Navigate to a URL Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element Click an element on the page Fill out an input field Select an element on the page with Select tag Hover an element on the page Execute JavaScript in the browser console

args.name: allowDangerous
args.description: Allow dangerous LaunchOptions that reduce security. When false, dangerous args like --no-sandbox will throw errors. Default false.

args.name: launchOptions
args.description: PuppeteerJS LaunchOptions. Default null. If changed and not null, browser restarts. Example: { headless: true, args: ['--no-sandbox'] }

commands.name: puppeteer_screenshot
commands.description: Take a screenshot of the current page or a specific element

args.name: selector
args.description: CSS selector for element to screenshot

commands.name: puppeteer_click
commands.description: Click an element on the page

args.name: selector
args.description: CSS selector for element to click

commands.name: puppeteer_select
commands.description: Select an element on the page with Select tag

args.name: selector
args.description: CSS selector for element to select

commands.name: puppeteer_hover
commands.description: Hover an element on the page

args.name: selector
args.description: CSS selector for element to hover

commands.name: puppeteer_evaluate
commands.description: Execute JavaScript in the browser console
